data.title: Certificate Renewal Failure - No domain can be authorized
data.meta_description:
I'm getting this error when I am trying to install Let's Encrypt: 
Failed to install Let's Encrypt for redrockroofing.com. 
No domains can be authorized

My domain is: www.redrockroofing.com 
The cert was working it. It …
data.text:
I'm getting this error when I am trying to install Let's Encrypt:

Failed to install Let's Encrypt for redrockroofing.com.

No domains can be authorized

My domain is: www.redrockroofing.com

The cert was working it. It didn't renew. I then deleted and it tried to reinstall. No go. Would greatly value help. Thank you!

I ran this command:

It produced this output:

My web server is (include version):

The operating system my web server runs on is (include version): Linux

My hosting provider, if applicable, is: Siteground

I can login to a root shell on my machine (yes or no, or I don't know): don't know

I'm using a control panel to manage my site (no, or provide the name and version of the control panel): No - Siteground has a custom system
